original_text: Daniel, you must now close this message. Put seals on the book so that nobody can open it until it is time for the end of this world. Many people will try to understand about these things. They will travel everywhere to get more knowledge.’
korean_text: 다니엘아 마지막 때까지 이 말을 간수하고 이 글을 봉함하라 많은 사람이 빨리 왕래하며 지식이 더하리라

sentences.original_text: Daniel, you must now close this message.
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘, 이제 이 메시지를 봉인해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: so that nobody can open it
until it is time for the end of this world.
Many people will try to understand about these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 이런 것들을 이해하려고 노력할 것이다.
